title: Riot sent me a mystery skin i already got
body: I loaded up League as usual and was amazed that Riot had sent me a mystery skin. But to my displease it was fiddle me timbers and i already got that skin so yeah ty anyone else got this problem. let me know.

replies.body: Yeah man no joke now I have two longhorn alistars whoopdy doo. It just sucks cause it was supposed to be a reward for the small fortunes spent on the old runes.
my friend gifted me a skin a mystery skin and i got amethyst ashe i already had amethyst ashe and i got nothing nothing even popped up wth this is not ok he spent 490 rp on me   please help
*Lew* is spot-on! Some players received some duplicate gift notifications for previous gifts after we re-enabled Gifting Notifications in the client. If you have any other questions, let me know!

They just enabled gifting [notifications ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/115002024567--Jan-26-Click-here-if-you-are-getting-notifications-about-receiving-gifts-in-the-updated-client-)in the new client so everyone is getting messages for gifts they got in the past.
